member_organisations:
Kemin Europa is a member of a number of European and National trade associations related to the product areas in which it operates. 
 
- FEFANA (EU Association of Specialty Feed Ingredients and their Mixtures) 
- FEFAC (European Feed Manufacturers' Federation) 
- FRANA (Belgium): Federatie van fabrikanten en vertegenwoordigers van toevoegingen voor dierlijke voeding/ Federation of manufacturers and representatives of animal feed additives 
- AWT (Germany): Arbeitsgemeinschaft für Wirkstoffe in der Tierernährung /Association for active ingredients in animal nutrition 
- BAFSAM (UK): British Association of Feed Supplement and Additive Manufacturers 
- VDDN (the Netherlands):  Branchevereniging voor producenten, importeurs en leveranciers van diervoederspecialiteiten en diergezondheidsproducten in Nederland / Trade Association for manufacturers, importers and suppliers of animal feed specialties in the Netherlands 
- BFA (Belgium): Belgian Feed Association (BFA)
fields_of_interest: Agriculture, Trade, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries, Research and innovation, Public Health, Food Safety
eu_initiatives:
- Feed and feed additives regulation 
- General Food law 
- Animal nutrition 
- Animal health and welfare 
- Food Hygiene 
- REACH Regulation
section: II - In-house lobbyists and trade/business/professional associations
goals__remit:
Kemin Europa is involved in research, development, marketing and distribution of nutritional and health solutions for all animal species. 
 
Kemin Europa is part of Kemin Industries (Kemin), a privately held, family-owned and operated global company headquartered in Des Moines, Iowa, USA. 
 
Built on exacting science and powered by human imagination, Kemin is an ingredient manufacturer committed to improving the quality, safety and efficacy of feed, food and health-related products (“inspired molecular solutions”). Through this commitment, Kemin touches more than 3.8 billion lives every day with our products and services.
position: Director Quality and Regulatory Affairs EMENA
